Projects.Name: GamesHub
Projects.Description: A versatile collection of online games accessible on web, Android, and iOS platforms, providing seamless and responsive gameplay suitable for all ages.

Projects.Name: Hackville 2024 - Community
Projects.Description: Led front-end development of a speed dating app for college students, featuring secure login and speed friending.Integrated interactive community features to boost campus engagement.

Projects.Name: Book-World
Projects.Description: Developed a secure, robust Spring Boot-based bookstore app with complex database operations and interactive Thymeleaf interfaces. Implemented Spring Security for user authentication and role management, enhancing data protection and access control.
